scripts.closure-make: java -jar "./node_modules/google-closure-compiler-java/compiler.jar" --charset="UTF-8" --warning_level="VERBOSE" --compilation_level="ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS" --language_in ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --language_out ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --strict_mode_input --rewrite_polyfills=false --use_types_for_optimization=true --jscomp_error "*" --jscomp_off lintVarDeclarations --jscomp_error=reportUnknownTypes --jscomp_error=checkTypes --externs "./externs/work_interface.js" --js "utils/*.js" --js "services/*.js" --js "components/*.js" --js "sophie-bluel.js" --js_output_file prod.sophie-bluel.js --emit_use_strict --formatting PRETTY_PRINT
